===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[can]], [[may]], [[be able to]]
#* {{zh-l|可能|possibly}}
#* {{zh-l|可以|can}}
#* {{zh-x|這 袋子{zi} 可 盛 五十 公斤。|This bag '''can''' hold 50 kilos.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 沒有 家 可 住。|He had no place to live.}}
# {{n-g|Particle used for emphasis.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 可 不 太 知道。|I don't '''really''' know.}}
# to [[approve]], to [[permit]]
#* {{zh-l|許可|to permit, to allow}}
#* {{zh-l|認可|to approve}}
# to [[suit]]
#* {{zh-l|可心|satisfying}}
# to be worth doing
#* {{zh-x|展覽 的{dí}確 '''可''' 看。|The exhibition is really '''worth''' seeing.}}
# {{n-g|Prefix attached to verbs, expressing possibility and turning them into adjectives. Similar to the English suffix {{m|en|-able}}.}}
#: {{zh-x|可吃|edible}}
#: {{zh-x|可愛|lovely}}
#: {{zh-x|可憐|pitiful}}
# {{zh-abbrev|可是|but}}
